content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Aziz, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I believe that my apartment is a great opportunity for you to rent a comfortable and convenient living space in the heart of the city. As a landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains from renting out the apartment. That being said, I am open to negotiating the rental price with you. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 300 Euros per month for the apartment.

This is the lowest price that I can afford to pay.

I want to be on good terms with my landlord and I want to avoid any future issues.

Therefore, I would like to negotiate the rental price with you.

What is your proposed rental price?

I apologize if my proposal is too low.

If it is, I am willing to increase it.

But I would like you to consider my proposal.

Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Thank you for your proposal, Aziz. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I am afraid that 300 Euros per month is not a price that I am willing to accept. As a landlord, I must maximize my gains from renting out the apartment, and I believe that 300 Euros is too low to cover my costs.

I am open to discussing a higher rental price with you, but I will need to see some financial information from you to ensure that you are able to afford the rental price that I am proposing. If you can provide me with this information, we can continue the negotiation and work towards finding a rental price that is mutually beneficial.

Thank you for your understanding, and I look forward to hearing back from you with the required financial information.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I apologize for my low proposal.

I understand that I need to provide financial information to prove my ability to pay the rental price.

I will provide you with my financial information as soon as possible.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Please let me know if there is anything else I need to do to complete the negotiation process.

Thank you.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Thank you for understanding, Aziz. I appreciate your willingness to provide financial information and complete the negotiation process.

Once you have provided me with the required financial information, we can continue to discuss the rental price and work towards finding a mutually beneficial agreement.

I will keep you updated on any further developments in the negotiation process, and I look forward to hearing back from you with the financial information.

Thank you for your time and consideration, and I wish you the best of luck in finding a suitable rental accommodation.
name: Heinrich Heine
